pages.text: Artifacts can be used as materials to upgrade other artifacts. Each artifact will have 2 numbers in its tooltip: the amount of artifact exp to reach the next level, and the amount of artifact exp it can be used as.$(br2)High level artifacts can transfer most of the artifact exp consumed when being used as materials to upgrade other artifacts, so don't worry about upgrading bad artifacts in early game.

To upgrade artifacts, you can either use Anvil or Artifact Pocket. In anvil, put artifacts on the left and materials on the right to upgrade artifacts.$(br2)You can also convert unused artifacts to artifact experience item to store them. Though, Artifact Pocket is still easier to use for storing artifacts, storing artifact exp, and upgrading artifacts.
